name: Guardian of Bible
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Phortion.GuardianofBible

Guardian of Bible is a turn-based simulation game.

Move your units and attack your enemies or heal your units, or even your enemies, if you want.

Each unit has an element, color. Every color has its own characters and relations with each other.

You can change your unit's element and reinforce them by using items.

Each tile has its own color and they will affect each character whether good or bad. So watch out your step.

Your attack doesn't end just one blow it will bring consecutive effects. Try to expect those and defeat your enemies.

You can read KJV Bible. (But It doesn't associate with the game content itself.)

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Phortion.GuardianofBible
